== Browse existing content

Arrows connected to //pub// are shown at startup.

Click in the background to open a prompt and enter anything to get back connected information. Try it with //42//.

Hide arrows  with ''x'' button. Show hidden children with //âˆŠ// button.  Repeat on subsequent children to //go meta//.

== Add content

Click background to open new prompts.

Use the //Split// button (or //Ctrl+P//) to build pair structures.

Type into prompts and validate to create //atoms//.

Drag & drop existing arrows into prompts to reuse them in new structures.
Or use //incoming// and //outgoing// buttons.

Note direct rooting of atoms often leads to space loss.

== Modify content

Unroot arrows to remove them for good.

Double-click to edit atoms. Changes will be propaged to visible descendants.

== Advanced text editing

Turn prompts into text areas with the //whale of text// button (.___.).
Then choose between //raw// and //wiki// text format. Wiki syntax is
[[http://wikicreole.org/wiki/Creole1.0|Creole 1.0]].

//Ctrl+Enter// also enlarges prompts and submits text input.

== File upload

Use //[...]// button to upload a file into a prompt.
